preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 58.99 g of chromium powder. 
 2. Measure out 15.999 g of phosphorus powder. 
 3. Measure out 98 g of technetium powder. 
 4. Measure out 47.867 g of titanium powder. 
 5. Combine all powders in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Use a mortar and pestle to grind the mixture until homogeneous. Ensure uniform distribution of all components.

steps: 1. Remove the solid sample from the crucible.
